short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'ReadFaster' optimizes webpages for faster, efficient reading via bionic techniques, enhancing productivity by increasing speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'ReadFaster' is a Chrome extension that utilizes bionic reading to enhance the readability of webpages. By converting text into a format optimized for faster reading, users can increase their reading speed and efficiency. This innovative approach to reading enables a user to absorb information quickly and effectively, ultimately saving time and improving productivity.
